solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public ListNode reverseList(ListNode head) {--newline--        if(head==null || head.next==null)--newline--            return head;--newline--        ListNode nextNode=head.next;--newline--        ListNode newHead=reverseList(nextNode);--newline--        nextNode.next=head;--newline--        head.next=null;--newline--        return newHead;--newline--    }--newline--}
